step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movement is good, but try to bring your shoulder blades back and down a bit more smoothly. Focus on the circular motion.
You're doing a great job squeezing your shoulder blades back. For the downward part of the roll, try to relax your shoulders down more deliberately.
Excellent! You're completing the circular motion well. Remember to inhale deeply as you roll your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on the circular motion and squeezing your shoulder blades back. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back.
